mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popup (popNum, popTitle, popContents, popCheck, popImage, startDay, endDay, storeId) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(max(popNum), 0)+1 FROM popup), #{popTitle}, #{popContents}, #{popCheck}, #{popImage}, to_date(#{startDay}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi'), to_date(#{endDay}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi'), #{storeId})
mapper.select:
SELECT popNum "popNum", popTitle "popTitle", popContents "popContents", popCheck "popCheck", popImage "popImage", to_char(startDay, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi') "startDay", to_char(endDay, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi') "endDay", storeId "storeId" FROM popup
popNum = #{popNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE popup set popTitle = #{popTitle}, popContents = #{popContents}, popCheck = #{popCheck}, popImage = #{popImage}, startDay = to_date(#{startDay}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi'), endDay = to_date(#{endDay}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi') where popNum = #{popNum}
